title: Complete React Frontend Development
description: Develop and implement the complete frontend interface for the internship management system using React, including responsive design and user authentication.
notes: Making excellent progress. Frontend components are well-structured and follow best practices.

title: Data Analysis and Visualization Dashboard
description: Create comprehensive data analysis tools and interactive visualization dashboard for business intelligence reporting.
notes: Strong analytical skills demonstrated. Dashboard prototypes show good understanding of user requirements.

title: Mobile Application Development
description: Develop cross-platform mobile application with offline capabilities and real-time synchronization features.
notes: Excellent work completed ahead of schedule. App received positive feedback from stakeholders.

title: Backend API Development
description: Design and implement RESTful APIs for fintech application with security best practices and performance optimization.
notes: Strong understanding of backend architecture. Code quality is excellent with good documentation.

title: Cybersecurity Assessment Framework
description: Develop comprehensive cybersecurity assessment framework including penetration testing tools and vulnerability analysis.
notes: Exceptional technical skills in cybersecurity. Framework shows innovative approach to vulnerability assessment.

title: UI/UX Design System
description: Create comprehensive design system with reusable components, style guides, and user experience guidelines.
notes: Outstanding design work with excellent attention to detail. Design system is comprehensive and well-documented.

title: DevOps Pipeline Implementation
description: Implement complete CI/CD pipeline with automated testing, deployment, and monitoring for cloud-native applications.
notes: Strong understanding of DevOps practices. Pipeline implementation shows good architectural decisions.

title: Quality Assurance Automation
description: Develop comprehensive test automation framework with continuous integration and automated reporting.
notes: Good understanding of testing principles. Framework design shows attention to maintainability.

title: Database Optimization Project
description: Optimize database performance through query optimization, indexing strategies, and caching implementation.
notes: Project delayed due to focus on frontend development. Need to prioritize completion.

title: Machine Learning Model Deployment
description: Deploy machine learning models to production with monitoring, versioning, and automated retraining capabilities.
notes: Scheduled to start after completion of current dashboard project.

title: Develop User Profile API Endpoint
description: Create a secure REST API endpoint for managing user profile data.
notes: Successfully deployed to staging environment.

title: Refactor Authentication Service
description: Improve the security and performance of the user authentication service.
notes: Password hashing upgrade in progress.

title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline for Frontend
description: Automate the build, test, and deployment process for the React frontend application.
notes: Working on deployment scripts for the final step.

title: Write E2E Tests for User Onboarding
description: Develop and implement end-to-end tests for the complete user registration and onboarding flow.
notes: Scheduled to begin after current feature development is complete.

title: Implement Redis Caching Layer
description: Integrate Redis to cache frequently accessed database queries to improve API response times.
notes: Observed a 40% reduction in average API response time.

title: Design System Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the new React component library.
notes: Initial setup complete, now documenting button and input components.

title: Migrate Database to PostgreSQL
description: Lead the effort to migrate the application database from MongoDB to PostgreSQL.
notes: Project pending approval from architecture review board.

title: Implement Websocket Notifications
description: Develop a real-time notification system using WebSockets.
notes: Successfully demonstrated real-time updates in the user dashboard.

title: Optimize Frontend Build Process
description: Reduce the production build time and bundle size of the React application.
notes: Bundle analysis complete. Now implementing route-based code splitting.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
description: Organize and conduct a UAT session for the new reporting module.
notes: Waiting for the reporting module to be deployed to the UAT environment.

title: Setup Centralized Logging System
description: Implement a centralized logging solution for all microservices using the ELK stack.
notes: Delayed due to unforeseen configuration issues with network policies.

title: Create a Reusable Modal Component
description: Design and develop a highly reusable and accessible modal component in React.
notes: Component is now widely used across the application.

title: Technical Spike: GraphQL Evaluation
description: Investigate the feasibility of adopting GraphQL for new APIs.
notes: Currently building the PoC with Apollo Server.

title: Upgrade Node.js Version
description: Upgrade the backend services from Node.js v16 to the latest LTS version (v20).
notes: Upgrade completed successfully with no major issues.

title: Peer Review Code Submissions
description: Actively participate in code reviews for team members, providing constructive feedback.
notes: Ongoing goal. Providing valuable feedback to the team.

title: Learn TypeScript
description: Gain proficiency in TypeScript and migrate a small service from JavaScript.
notes: Have selected a course on Udemy to start with.

title: Implement Feature Flags
description: Integrate a feature flag system to allow for safer, incremental feature rollouts.

milestones.title: Wrap new feature in a flag

notes: SDK is integrated on both frontend and backend.

title: On-call Duty Training
description: Shadow a senior engineer during their on-call rotation to learn troubleshooting procedures.
notes: Successfully resolved the mock incident and demonstrated good problem-solving skills.

title: Improve API Documentation
description: Update and improve the existing API documentation using Swagger/OpenAPI.
notes: This is a low-priority task for the end of the year.

title: Fix Security Vulnerabilities
description: Address the medium-severity vulnerabilities identified in the latest Snyk scan.

milestones.title: Run tests to ensure no breaking changes

notes: Working on updating dependencies. One package has breaking changes.

title: Set up a Staging Environment
description: Create a new staging environment that mirrors production for better pre-release testing.
notes: Staging environment is now fully operational and integrated into the CI/CD pipeline.

title: Accessibility Audit for Frontend
description: Perform an accessibility audit of the main application and fix any critical issues found.
notes: Almost complete. Final touches being added to ARIA labels.

title: Develop a Data Export Feature
description: Create a feature that allows users to export their data as a CSV file.
notes: Feature is working well and has been released to users.

title: Investigate Micro-frontend Architecture
description: Research micro-frontend architecture and create a proposal for its potential use.
notes: Scheduled for early next year.

title: Load Testing for Checkout API
description: Perform load testing on the checkout API to ensure it can handle peak traffic.
notes: Testing was blocked by an environment outage. Analysis is now in progress.

title: Implement Internationalization (i18n)
description: Add support for multiple languages in the React frontend using react-i18next.
notes: Library is integrated. Currently extracting English strings from the main components.

title: Set up Database Backups
description: Configure automated daily backups for the production PostgreSQL database.

milestones.title: Set up cron job on server

notes: Daily backups are running successfully and stored securely in S3.

title: Create a Tech Talk Presentation
description: Prepare and deliver a tech talk to the engineering team on a topic of choice.

milestones.title: Choose a topic and create outline

notes: Considering a topic on 'The Event Loop in Node.js'.

title: Refactor CSS to Styled-Components
description: Migrate the frontend from traditional CSS files to using styled-components for better modularity.
notes: Migration complete, resulting in a much cleaner and more maintainable codebase.

title: Set up Monitoring and Alerting
description: Implement monitoring for key application metrics and set up alerts for critical issues.
notes: Instrumentation is complete. Now defining rules for CPU usage and API error rates.

title: Create Internal Tool for Customer Support
description: Develop a small internal web application to help the customer support team look up user data.
notes: Requirements gathering meeting is scheduled for next month.

title: Write Unit Tests for Payment Service
description: Increase the unit test coverage for the critical payment service from 60% to over 90%.

milestones.title: Write tests for edge cases and error handling

notes: Test coverage for the payment service is now at 92%.

title: Optimize SQL Queries
description: Analyze and optimize slow-running SQL queries in the reporting module.

milestones.title: Use EXPLAIN ANALYZE to find bottlenecks
Add necessary indexes and rewrite queries

notes: Identified two queries that are causing performance issues. Now analyzing their execution plans.

title: Technical Debt Pay-down
description: Allocate time to address known technical debt issues in the legacy user service.
notes: Ongoing effort during downtime. Documentation has been improved.

title: Containerize the Application
description: Create Dockerfiles and a docker-compose setup for the entire application stack for easier local development.
notes: The entire team has now adopted the Docker setup for local development, saving significant setup time.

title: Implement an Emailing Service
description: Develop a microservice responsible for sending transactional emails (e.g., welcome emails, password resets).

milestones.title: Set up message queue with RabbitMQ
Create worker service to consume messages

notes: Email service is live and reliably sending all transactional emails.

title: State Management with Redux
description: Refactor the frontend to use Redux for more predictable and centralized state management.

milestones.title: Set up Redux store and slices

notes: This major refactor is planned for Q4.

title: Mentor a New Intern
description: Provide guidance and support to a newly joined intern, helping them get up to speed.

milestones.title: Pair program on their first ticket

notes: New intern is now set up. Pair programming session scheduled for next week.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design the database schema for the upcoming 'Projects' feature.
notes: The schema has been approved and is ready for implementation.

title: Bug Triage and Prioritization
description: Take ownership of the bug backlog, triaging new issues and helping to prioritize them for upcoming sprints.

milestones.title: Review and reproduce all new bugs for July

notes: Most bugs have been triaged. Last step of clearing old reports was delayed due to a production issue.

title: Explore Serverless Architecture
description: Build a proof-of-concept API using AWS Lambda and API Gateway.

milestones.title: Compare costs to current EC2 setup

notes: A future task to explore modern cloud architectures.

title: Implement API Rate Limiting
description: Add rate limiting to public-facing APIs to prevent abuse and ensure stability.

milestones.title: Choose and implement a rate-limiting library
Apply middleware to relevant API routes

notes: Using 'express-rate-limit' with a Redis store. Now applying the middleware to routes.

title: Create a Postman Collection for APIs
description: Develop a comprehensive Postman collection for all backend APIs to aid in testing and onboarding.
notes: The collection is now the standard for manual API testing within the team.

title: Set up GitHub Actions for Linting
description: Create a GitHub Actions workflow to automatically run the linter on every pull request.

milestones.title: Test the action on a feature branch

notes: Workflow is running successfully, improving code quality automatically.

title: Develop a Form Builder Component
description: Create a dynamic, configuration-based form builder component in React.
notes: Basic rendering from a JSON config is working. Now implementing validation rules.

title: Incident Post-mortem Leadership
description: Lead the post-mortem meeting for the next production incident, documenting root causes and action items.
notes: Awaiting the next incident to take the lead on this process.

title: Implement a Dark Mode Theme
description: Add a dark mode theme to the frontend application, allowing users to switch between light and dark modes.

milestones.title: Test all components in both themes

notes: Dark mode has been successfully launched and received positive user feedback.

title: System Design Documentation
description: Create a high-level system design document for the current application architecture.
notes: Architectural diagrams are complete. Now documenting the request/response data flow.

title: Implement Health Check Endpoint
description: Create a /health endpoint on all microservices for automated monitoring and service discovery.

milestones.title: Configure load balancer to use endpoint

notes: All services now report their health status, improving the reliability of deployments.

title: Final Internship Presentation
description: Prepare and deliver a final presentation summarizing all work, projects, and learnings from the internship period.
notes: The culmination of the entire internship period. To be started at the end of the year.
